animationAssetMappings.name: Asset Mappings
animationAssetMappings.hint: Determines the mappings for various assets to identifiers of individual Foundry system items.

mappingSync.name: Mapping Sync
mappingSync.hint: Indicates when the mappings were last synchronized.

syncMappingButton.name: Sync Mappings
syncMappingButton.hint: Synchronizes the animation mappings with any changes to the module.
